description: All northbound lanes of I-75 were blocked early Friday by a wreck in Henry County, but traffic is now getting by in the two left lanes.
title: I-75 NB in Henry County reopens after truck wreck
title_page: I-75 NB in Henry County reopens after truck wreck
text:
All northbound lanes of I-75 were blocked early Friday by a wreck in Henry County, but traffic is now getting by in the two left lanes.
A tractor-trailer and a car were involved in the crash, which happened around 7 a.m. on I-75 northbound at Ga. 20 near McDonough.
Authorities reopened a couple of lanes just before 8 a.m.
Two people were reported injured in the crash.
Please return to AJC.com for updates and check the WSB 24-hour Traffic Center for more information on this and other issues on metro Atlanta interstates and roadways.
